column2: "Na Israel nyinara boaboaa hɔn ano kɔr David nkyɛn wɔ Hebron
column5: yɛyɛ wo biew na wo honam."

column3: mekyerɛ aber a Saul dzi hen no
column4: ɔwo nye nyia ɔdze Israel kɔr sa na ɔdze hɔn sanee bae: na w'EWURADZE Nyankopɔn see wo dɛ
column5: Ɔwo na ebɛnyɛn me man Israel
column6: na ɔwo na ebɛyɛ bapɔmba wɔ me man Israel do."

column2: "Na Israel mpanyimfo no nyinara baa ɔhen no nkyɛn wɔ Hebron; na David nye hɔn dzii ahyɛmu wɔ EWURADZE enyim wɔ Hebron; na wɔseraa David ngo hyɛɛ no ɔhen wɔ Israel do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔnam Samuel do kae no tse."

column2: "Na David na Israel nyinara sii mu kɔr Jerusalɛm (ɔnoara nye Jebus); nna Jebusfo no
"Na Jebus atsefo no see David dɛ
column3: Ɔwo mma mmba ha. Naaso David gyee Zion akoban no; ɔnoara so nye David kurow no."
Obiara a obedzi kan eku Jebusfo no ɔbɛyɛ otsitsir na safohen. Na Zeruia ne ba Joab dzii kan fowee kɔree

column2: "Na David tsenaa akoban no mu; dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ no David no kurow."

column3: ɔdze fi Millo araa bɔɔ aprɔw: na Joab yɛɛ kurow nkaa no yie."

column2: "Na David kɔr do yɛɛ otsitsir ara; osiandɛ dɔm EWURADZE no dzii n'ekyir."
"Afei woyinom nye mbarimba akatakyi a David nyae no mu etsitsir a wɔhyɛɛ hɔnho dzen kaa no ho wɔ n'ahendzi no mu
column3: dɛ wɔnye Israel nyinara bɛhyɛ no hen
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔwɔ Israel ho no tse."

column2: "Na mbarimba akatakyi a David nyae no hɔn dodow nye yi: Jasobeam Hakmonnyi bi ne ba no
column3: eduasa no mu otsitsir no; ɔno na ɔmaa ne peaa do wɔ ahaasa do kum hɔn prɛko no."

column4: Ahohnyi a ɔyɛ mbarimba baasa no mu baako no."

column2: "Nna ɔno na ɔwɔ David nkyɛn wɔ Pas-dammim no
column3: na hɔ na Filistiafo aboaboa hɔn ano dɛ wɔrobɔko. Nna asaasetɔw a atoko ayɛ do ma wɔ hɔ; na ɔman no fii Filistiafo no enyim guanee."

column4: na wokum Filistiafo no; na EWURADZE nam konyim kɛse do gyee hɔn nkwa."

column2: "Na etsitsir eduasa no mu baasa siaan famu kɔr ɔbotan no do wɔ David nkyɛn
column3: wɔ Adullam ɔbo tu no mu; nna Filistiafo dɔm no akyer nsera wɔ Refaim ɔbɔn no mu."

column2: "Aber no nna David wɔ tu no mu
column3: na Filistiafo bansifo no so wɔwɔ Bɛtlɛhɛm aber no mu."

column4: Ao kɛtseankyɛ obi aama me Bɛtlɛhɛm nsubura a ɔwɔ kuropon no ho no mu nsu bi ma maanom!"

column2: "Na baasa no bɔe faa Filistiafo dɔm no mu
column3: na wɔkɛsaaw Bɛtlɛhɛm nsubura a ɔwɔ kuropon no ho no mu nsu bi
column4: na wɔfae dze brɛɛ David: naaso ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔnom
column5: na mbom ohuei gui maa EWURADZE
column10: dɛ mebɛyɛ iyi: ana monnom mbarimba yi a wɔdze hɔn nkwa kitsaa hɔn nsamu yi bɔgyaa? Osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn nkwa kitsaa hɔn nsamu kɛfae bae. Dɛm ntsi ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔnom. Iyi nye dza mbarimba akatakyi baasa no yɛe."

column3: na ɔyɛ baasa no mu otsitsir: na ɔmaa ne peaa do wɔ ahaasa do kunkum hɔn
column4: na onyaa dzin wɔ baasa no mu."

column3: ɔno na ɔyɛ onyimnyamfo dodow sen beenu no
column4: na wɔyɛɛ no hɔn safohen: naaso ɔannto baasa no a wodzii kan no."

column3: ɔbarimba bi a ɔyɛ ndam a ofi Kabzeel ne ba no a ɔyɛɛ akatakyidze no
column4: ɔno na okum Moab nyimpa gyatasɛfo beenu no: na osianee so kokum gyata wɔ mona bi mu wɔ esukwankyɛba ber mu."

column3: ɔbarimba kɛse bi a ne tsentsen yɛ basafa enum; na Egyptnyi no kitsa peaa a ɔtse dɛ ɔtanwemfo nsadua wɔ ne nsamu; na ɔdze poma sianee kɔr ne nkyɛn
column4: na okohwiim peaa no wɔ Egyptnyi no nsamu
column5: na ɔdze nankasa ne peaa no kum no."

column2: "Iyinom na Jehoiada ne ba Benaia yɛe
column3: na onyaa dzin wɔ mbarimba akatakyi baasa no mu."
ɔyɛ onyimnyamfo dodow sen eduasa no
column4: na mbom ɔannto baasa no a wodzii kan no: na David dze no sii n'annkɔbeafo do."

column2: "Eso dɔm no mu mbarimba akatakyi no nye yi; Joab no nua Asahel
column3: Dodo ne ba Elhanan a ofi Bɛtlɛhɛm;"

column2: "Ribai a ofi Benjaminmba Gibea ne ba Itai

column3: Aroernyi Hotam ne mba Sama na Jeiel;"
